name: Duel 24 Points
description:
classic Puzzle Game! Training your Brain and Mindset!

Hundreds of Puzzles are waiting for you. Try to find a equation that equals to 24 with the giving 4 numbers. Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, and Division. No stop thinking. Duel 24 Points is extremely fun, addictive and will keep your entertained for hours!

Feature:
-Hundreds of different Puzzles
-Prefect Graphic, Pithy UI
-Best design for Mobile Device
-Classic Game, best for killing time, suit for Children or Old People.
